title: When would you use classes and when would you use namespaces?

choices.a: Use classes to encapsulate code and represent objects, and namespaces to avoid symbol name collisions
choices.b: Use classes for performance-sensitive code, and namespaces when readability matters more
choices.c: Use namespaces for performance-sensitive code, and classes when readability matters more
choices.d: Always use them; namespaces are always superior to classes
